commitMessage:
Implement Dark Mode Only: Enforce consistent dark theme across all environments

- Add 'dark' class to HTML element in layout.tsx for Tailwind dark mode
- Simplify CSS variables in globals.css to use only dark mode values
- Remove redundant body styles that caused conflicts between light/dark modes
- Remove darkMode config from tailwind.config.ts (no longer needed)
- Fixes white background issue on different VMs/browsers
- Ensures robust dark-only display regardless of system preferences
